text: ya 'ashab alkutub almnzlt min alyhwd walnsara, kayf yujadil kl minkum fi 'an 'iibrahim ealayh alslam kan ealaa mllath, wama 'unzlt altawrat wal'iinjil 'iilaa min bedh? 'afala tafqahun khataan qwlkm: 'iina 'iibrahim kan yhwdyaan 'aw nsranyaan, waqad ealimtum 'ana alyahudiat walnsranyt hadathat baed wafatih bhyn?
